sentences.en: He occupies a three-story dwelling place on the Park Street.
sentences.cn: 他在派克街上有一幢3层楼的寓所。

sentences.en: Two - and three-story buildings are going up on every block.
sentences.cn: 每个街区里不断有两三层高的建筑拔地而起。

sentences.en: At the top of a three-story brick building, Sue and Johnsy had their studio.
sentences.cn: 在一幢三层砖楼的顶层，苏和约翰西辟了个画室。
